column5: I've entered the photo of my big pike from Eddie's camp into a little photo contest a friend is putting on and I could use your help with some votes. Yeah, I know................. not again!!!!  You just need to LIKE the Salty Shores   page (on the right under join us on Facebook) and my Contest Entry (below my entry). You can also fShare, Tweet and Google +1 the entry. The contest runs for 30 days.  Thanks for your help OFNers!!!!    :thumbsup_anim:
When will the video be done? Just wondering.

Working on it. Iy will be done soon. I want it right before publishing. I'm not one to rush these things Mike. Besides it's summer in the arctic and I need to enjoy all 2 months of it!!! LOL. Been busy planting trees around my place and working on boats so I can do a little fishing. Priorities man.
I THINK I did it,never sure about facebook stuff.   vance
